dcterms:description: The IFS operational forecast dataset is used as input data for training the model, providing hourly forecasts of various atmospheric fields including total precipitation and surface pressure.
dcterms:title: IFS operational forecast dataset

dcterms:description: The NIMROD radar dataset serves as the 'truth' dataset, providing high-resolution radar-derived precipitation maps every 5 minutes, which are used to evaluate the performance of the model.
dcterms:title: NIMROD radar dataset
